https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sCGzYv306V4H5stUJuELglCahCe.jpg Rudra and Partho's desire to adopt a child leads Rudra to take the most crucial decision. Rudra decides to undergo sex reassignment surgery, so that they can be legally considered a couple and allowed to adopt a baby. Chitrangada: The Crowning Wish
